short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Search the web faster when you download the Quick Search extension from Microsoft Bing

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: It’s easy—Go to any website and highlight the text you want to look up. With just one click, you’ll see your search results on Bing—without ever having to open a new tab or type in the search bar.
